ComicInfo.Title: Over The Hill With The Swords Of A Thousand Men Conclusion
ComicInfo.Summary:
The showdown between Butcher and the Homelander turns out to be something neither of them expected, as all Hell breaks loose in the Washington skies and MM teaches Hughie one last Secret History lesson. One story ends and another begins, as Over The Hill With The Swords Of A Thousand Men reaches its bloody conclusion. Over 30 pages of story and art! The Countdown begins! 7 issues to go!
General Notes
Queen Maeve, The Deep, Mister Marathon, Jack from Jupiter and The Lamplighter are seen in a flashback cameo only.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-19 09:21:45. [CVDB326852]
ComicInfo.Penciller: John McCrea, Keith Burns, Russell Braun, John McCrea, Keith Burns, Russell Braun
ComicInfo.Inker: John McCrea, Keith Burns, Russell Braun
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Noir, Butcher, Female of the Species, Frenchman, Greg Mallory, Jack from Jupiter, Mister Marathon, Mother's Milk, Oh Father, Queen Maeve, The Deep, The Homelander, The Lamplighter, Wee Hughie
